acceptance_criteria.criterion: Admission-critical evidence rejected unless TotalOrder finalized
Evidence predicates are auditable and replayable

implementation.summary:
Enforce StrictlyOrderedEvidence for Admission-critical artifacts and
extend GateReceipt generation to include evidence predicates.

notes:
